fonts.name: Poppins Regular
fonts.prompt: Poppins Regular – a clean, geometric sans-serif font with modern proportions and evenly rounded letters, ideal for subtitles.

fonts.name: Poppins Bold
fonts.prompt: Poppins Bold – a heavier, more pronounced version of Poppins with thick strokes and consistent geometry, great for emphasizing text.

fonts.name: Poppins Black
fonts.prompt: Poppins Black – ultra-bold and dense with strong presence, suitable for striking emphasis in headings or dramatic subtitles.

fonts.name: Poppins Thin Italic
fonts.prompt: Poppins Thin Italic – an elegant, ultra-light and slanted version of Poppins with graceful curves and delicate line weight.

fonts.name: Roboto Regular
fonts.prompt: Roboto Regular – a neutral, legible sans-serif with a mechanical skeleton and friendly curves, ideal for clear subtitle readability.

fonts.name: Roboto Bold
fonts.prompt: Roboto Bold – a strong, sturdy sans-serif with modern lines and high readability, commonly used in impactful titles.

fonts.name: Roboto Light Italic
fonts.prompt: Roboto Light Italic – lightweight and softly slanted with graceful transitions, perfect for secondary or quoted text in subtitles.

fonts.name: Montserrat Regular
fonts.prompt: Montserrat Regular – a modern sans-serif inspired by urban signage, featuring slightly wide letterforms and a clean, technical look.

fonts.name: Montserrat SemiBold
fonts.prompt: Montserrat SemiBold – slightly thicker than regular with strong yet refined strokes, giving subtitles more presence without overwhelming.

fonts.name: Montserrat ExtraBold
fonts.prompt: Montserrat ExtraBold – very thick and bold, conveying urgency or strong emphasis, with sharp terminal ends.

fonts.name: Lato Regular
fonts.prompt: Lato Regular – a humanist sans-serif with semi-rounded letterforms and a warm yet professional feel, ideal for balanced typography.

fonts.name: Lato Black Italic
fonts.prompt: Lato Black Italic – very bold and stylishly slanted with slightly rounded terminals, offering a strong modern flair.

fonts.name: Lato Light
fonts.prompt: Lato Light – thin and airy with soft curves, suitable for subtle subtitles or minimalist design aesthetics.

fonts.name: Open Sans Regular
fonts.prompt: Open Sans Regular – a highly legible sans-serif font with open counters and neutral curves, optimized for both web and video.

fonts.name: Open Sans Bold
fonts.prompt: Open Sans Bold – clear and commanding, yet friendly in tone; ideal for visible, clean subtitle overlays.

fonts.name: Inter Medium
fonts.prompt: Inter Medium – a workhorse sans-serif font with excellent spacing and rhythm, designed for modern screens and UI subtitles.

fonts.name: Inter ExtraBold
fonts.prompt: Inter ExtraBold – extremely bold with tight kerning and high contrast, perfect for attention-grabbing text.

fonts.name: Raleway Regular
fonts.prompt: Raleway Regular – a stylish, elegant sans-serif with tall letterforms and thin strokes, suitable for modern cinematic subtitles.

fonts.name: Raleway Heavy
fonts.prompt: Raleway Heavy – a dramatic weight of the Raleway family with bold elegance, often used in title sequences or captions.

fonts.name: Nunito Regular
fonts.prompt: Nunito Regular – a well-balanced sans-serif font with rounded terminals and soft structure, giving a friendly, clean look.

fonts.name: Nunito ExtraBold
fonts.prompt: Nunito ExtraBold – bold and playful with wide curves, providing high visual impact while retaining approachability.

fonts.name: Playfair Display Regular
fonts.prompt: Playfair Display Regular – a transitional serif font with classic styling and high contrast, suitable for elegant or artistic subtitles.

fonts.name: Playfair Display Black
fonts.prompt: Playfair Display Black – bold and ornate with sharp serifs and dramatic contrast, perfect for high-end, expressive overlays.

fonts.name: Merriweather Regular
fonts.prompt: Merriweather Regular – a serif font designed for readability on screens, with a slightly condensed shape and soft curves.

fonts.name: Merriweather Bold Italic
fonts.prompt: Merriweather Bold Italic – strong and expressive with slanted traditional serifs, useful for classic but assertive subtitle text.

fonts.name: Oswald Regular
fonts.prompt: Oswald Regular – a reworked gothic-style font with narrow width and tall letterforms, creating tight and clear subtitles.

fonts.name: Oswald Heavy
fonts.prompt: Oswald Heavy – thick and compressed with minimal spacing, delivering dramatic, punchy text in subtitle overlays.

fonts.name: Fira Sans Regular
fonts.prompt: Fira Sans Regular – a versatile sans-serif font with clean lines and solid readability, well-suited for UI and caption use.

fonts.name: Fira Sans Bold Italic
fonts.prompt: Fira Sans Bold Italic – bold with dynamic slant and smooth curves, perfect for highlighting speaker emphasis or quoted dialogue.

fonts.name: Source Sans Pro Regular
fonts.prompt: Source Sans Pro Regular – a professional, open-source sans-serif with high clarity, tailored for interface and subtitle work.
